name: Nkosazana (Water Maiden)
shortLoreBlurb: Nkosazana (Water Maiden) is a spirit from Xhosa associated with virgin of the water, healing. Appeased for safe passage and rains.

description: Nkosazana (Water Maiden) is a spirit from Xhosa associated with virgin of the water, healing. Appeased for safe passage and rains.
